titleStmt.title: A present for teeming vvomen, or, Scripture-directions for women with child how to prepare for the houre of travel / written first for the private use of a gentlewoman of quality in the West, and now published for the common good by John Oliver.
titleStmt.author: Oliver, John, 1601-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Sarah Griffin for Mary Rothwell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
